description:
Jinbei heads to meet the lord of Kishuu, but he finds Hibachi instead.  The party meets with the rest of the City Patrol group and enjoys a brief rest.  But the time limit is drawing nigh, and just when the Ten Crucifix Insects attack the people of Kishuu...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Time`s Up! The Insect Magistrate`s Office Arrives!
刻限の時 蟲奉行所見参!
